website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung SSD 850 Pro is one of the best standard consumer-grade solid-state drives on the market, but there are cheaper alternatives with similar performance.
pros: The Samsung SSD 850 Pro has fast performance, high endurance -- you can write a lot of data to it before it becomes unreliable -- and its 2TB capacity is the highest on the market
The drive comes with a lot of useful features, including encryption, and a great performance-boosting mode called Rapid
cons: The drive is expensive compared with competing solid-state drives
The Samsung Magician software only works with Windows

customer_reviews.title: FAST!  Reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Of all of the 128GB SSD drives available, this one has proven to last the longest in read/write testing - over 2 PETABYTES before failing. I use this on my home server (Gigabyte Z170X Gaming 7, Windows Server 2012R2, SQL Server 2012, Visual Studio 2014, etc. etc.) Very fast loading. I have a total of 12TB of storage on the server; several of the drives are SSD and this beats them, hands down. When the Samsung SM961 m.2 comes out, I'll move this drive to my laptop. Here's the proof on the durability and longevity: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Clyde L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Almost plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding performance. I did have some "data migration" issues as my system disk did not have a reserved space for the boot loader. It was in the primary partition, which is legal. Eventually I was able to solve the problems. Samsung tech support was pretty good at giving me hints on what to try. I will say to others, "don't screw around with your BIOS settings". If you don't have a plain vanilla system you may have issues. Also, your motherboard may not support the latest SATA features, which can cause you some head scratching before things are sorted out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These SSD's changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: HOORAY FOR SSD's! I bought 2 of these, first this 128GB and then quickly realized I needed more space so I bought the 250GB one. I installed both in the PC I built myself 5 years ago and am now booting windows from an SSD and boy is it fast! Running adobe software like photoshop, premiere pro, audition and after effects is like a dream now with these! I store all documents and files on some regular WD green drives and save these babies to do all the heavy lifting running programs. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Kate MahoneyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: The standard for SSDs, as far as I'm concerned
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This SSD is FAST. See the picture below. That is with RAPID enabled. I'm coming from a Samsung 840 and this is a ridiculous upgrade from that. Even coming from the 840, I notice a much faster reboot cycle. I'm very happy with this purchase. Can't complain one bit. Samsung Magician and Samsung Data Migration Software are wonderful. I cloned my SSD in about 12 minutes (128GB) and the installation process was so simple. Really can't recommend Samsung enough for your SSD needs.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD, perfect for a media center
customer_reviews.text: Great SSD; Used to build a i5 media PC; using the ASUS VM60-G106M and Crucial 8GB Kit (4GBx2) DDR3 1600 MT/s (PC3 -... Crucial. Paired with a touch screen monitor. Installed the RC wnidows 10 and kodi(xbmc); system is blazing fast with 0 lag. Exactly what I was looking for in a media center. Now have a complete media station in kitchen that can stream just about anything from hbogo, to latest cooking techniques on youtube; or feed my netflix addiction.
customer_reviews.author: zerobane

customer_reviews.title: #1 for a reason......
customer_reviews.text: Best drives for the reasons already stated by others, huge warranty, best speeds, computers FLY at boot up. This IS the biggest bang for the buck you can do to your system, even better than extra memory. Once you have an SSD, its almost impossible to tolerate a standard hard drive in your computer systems. Expensive per GB? Yep, but use it as only a boot drive or for needed games, programs, and put your crap on a cheap standard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised - plus a little more!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty fast. I put it up against my Intel 730 SSD and got slightly better #'s 97,436 Random Read IO 399.10 MBPS .32 avg MS response time (This is where I see others fail, keep your AVG & peak response times down, the entire system performs better) 88,991 Random Write IO 364.43 MBPS .35 avg MS response time. All in all pretty hearty, well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Windows 7 computer in anticipation of Windows 10. I installed it and transfered my operating system over to it with the included software without a hitch. I can't believe how much faster my system boots up now! My Windows experience score for my Hard Drive went from 6.9 to 7.7. If I bother to upgrade my graphics card I'll have a super system. lol... I'd buy another one of these drives in a heartbeat if needed.
customer_reviews.author: NLWPS of Amherst

customer_reviews.title: BLAZINGLY fast!
customer_reviews.text: This drive brought an older i3 laptop back to life! The computer now boots to the desktop under 4 seconds. Shuts down within 3 seconds of clicking shut down. I will have to get one of these for my gaming machine after seeing what it did for a little i3 laptop! If you are looking for a new hard drive and not sure what to get, I would recommend this drive over any other SSD because of how fast it is! I see another one of these in my near future for my gaming machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C.

customer_reviews.title: Good drive
customer_reviews.text: Fine little drive that powered up and does exactly what I was expecting it to do. The other reviews on longevity say that it lasts a good long time and I am expecting that as well. This drive is really light and small and even though I didn't get a bracket I have Velcro'd it to the inside of my case and it is holding just fine so far (only a few weeks so far, but doing good)
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Buy this drive.
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST Solid state drive I've ever had. Fast and reliable. I've had it for over 2 years now without reformatting my operating system and it's still as fast as it was when I first installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: If it's not the best it's second best...You decide
customer_reviews.text: Dropped this into a Celeron G1820 Processor system on a budget ECS mATX board with a SATA II HD. What did take about a minute to boot now hits the desktop ready for action in about 15 seconds. Win 7 action score for the drive is 7.9. I used the included cloning software to clone the old 250 GB HD to the 850 and it took less then 10 minutes and gave me no problems
customer_reviews.author: Grippy

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and reliable drive!Buy it, but DO NOT UPGRADE FIRMWARE
customer_reviews.text: For me is a great product.It has a little bit less perfomance(the 128 GB model) that the other models but that's doesn't matter for me, just DO NOT UPDATE SSD FIRMWARE(or your ssd will turn into a nice lightweight paperweight) at least UNTIL SAMSUNG FIX the bricking problem. I do not use the software bundled with it.My Windows 8.1 boots very fast ins just 6 seconds!I will see how it's working through time and I will update this review as i can.
customer_reviews.author: gustalitro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome results!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of my wife using my laptop because hers was too slow. As an IT Admin, I think this is a great SSD, Samsung and Intel have the best performance and the lowest failure rates (I used to be head of service and support for a major computer manufacturer so I know failure rates) and upgrading to an SSD was my only option for speeding up her laptop. Overall system performance increased 10-fold. She's happy, I'm happy and that's all that needs to be said.
customer_reviews.author: Will W

customer_reviews.title: SSD finally delivers the goods in the 850 Pro
customer_reviews.text: 850 Pro finally fulfills the promise of SSD. I've had a number of them with 500+ specs, but I never noticed any significant improvment over 7200 RPM hard disks until I got this drive. With a significant boost in speed and a 10 year/150 Tbyte warranty, this is the only SSD I will be buying for the forseen future. It is also OPAL self-encrypting if you need that feature.
customer_reviews.author: RKParkinson

customer_reviews.title: The Samsung Electronics 850 SSD is fast, accurate, powerful and absolutely fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Electronics 850 SSD is fast, powerful and absolutely fantastic. It put new life into a machine that had been starting to show its age. My computer used to take around 24sec to boot but since installing it only takes 5~6. your typical "hdd" is no match for this ssd and with a 10*yr Warranty I feel I will never have to worry about my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Solid solid state drive
customer_reviews.text: Been using it the last 4 years as my system drive. Fast and reliable so far :)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Howard

customer_reviews.title: The Samsung 850 pro 512GB and 128GB are excellent! My computer boots in seconds and once booted ...
customer_reviews.text: Pumped life back into my 2011 iMac! It's running at 150% way faster than it was when I first bought the iMac! I probably added another 4 years to its lifecycle. The Samsung 850 pro 512GB and 128GB are excellent! My computer boots in seconds and once booted up apps can be opened immediately. Power hungry apps like Premiere pro and Avid are opened in seconds! This was one of the best investments I ever made! I'll most likely remain with Samsung the SSDs in the future. I'm really happy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cornwall

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Very Fast
customer_reviews.text: I own this models little brother (840 Pro) There is a measurable speed difference between these models. Kiss your extended load times goodbye!! You want OS boot? DONE! You want to drop into the Map before others Spawn in? DONE!! You want loud, slow read/write speeds? Well, I cannot help you there. ^This is not the SSD for that.
customer_reviews.author: Crue

customer_reviews.title: One word to describe this "Fast". The read and ...
customer_reviews.text: One word to describe this "Fast". The read and writes on this drive is nothing short of the word "fast". Reads are about 450 and Writes about 550. This SSD is built to last for years, with a warranty of 10 years. This would be way worth it for the cost than an Intel SSD.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this to my son laptop. It fast and load Windows much faster. However, SATA3 SSD is reaching its limitation, and cannot squeeze any faster. The only thing left to determine is input and output speed, size and energy consume. If never have SSD experience before, this is a good way to start.

customer_reviews.title: It's the top I know for now... ...

The only time i hear my PC AT ALL is when the backup HDD kicks in. when i installed windows 7 & some programs the drive was 60G full, i was worried i didnt buy enough space. But then i installed the software included with the SSD. It had a feature to optimize the OS for the SSD. When i ran this, the drive reduced in utilized space from 60GB all the down to 35GB that was a giant savings in space! add in the 10 year warranty & i cant be any happier. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Top notch speed.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very fast. The software is actually useful with lots of configuration options for both the basic and advanced user. Kudos to Samsung all around on this one. Curious to see if it actually lasts anything like the ten year warranty, but I have a (hopefully!) long wait to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is fast! Upgraded from a Kingston Hyper X SSD and I was surprised how much faster this one is. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good seller. Good product. Good price. Quick delivery. I got exactly what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Benchmarking using the Samsung Magician software I found out drive is about 10% SLOWER then the 128 GB Samsung 840 Pro I already had.....

customer_reviews.title: Best investment in regards to drives I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: Best investment in regards to drives I have ever made. I will never go back to a standard drive on any system.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased and used several of these (840's and 850's) over the past few years and they have been great. Very fast and so far flawless. I wouldn't hesitate recommending them to anyone.

customer_reviews.text: awesome........this made my boot time go down to 24 seconds......worth every penny

customer_reviews.title: Easy transfer from previous device.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a smaller drive. Pros: Samsung transfer software made transferring my info easy. Great speed. Nice clean look in my game computer. Cons: None so far.

customer_reviews.text: Good product, a little fiddly at first - needs to be formatted correctly for your use

product_meta.title: 850 Pro MZ-7KE128BW 128 GB 2.5" Internal Solid State Drive
product_meta.description:
The Samsung 850 PRO will keep you working with the efficiency of what you would expect from a solid state drive.Magician software gives you the option to enhance your performance, performing 1.8 times faster in the RAPID mode. Get enhance performance,lower power consumption with LPDDR2 DRAM cache memory and Samsung 3-core MEX controller. This is an ideal solution for business professionals and PC Gamers. There is no comparison with the increased load times and the reliability you get from a solid state drive of this caliber.

SELLER WARRANTY DESCRIPTION
10 Years/150TBW
